name: com.gurbu.gpui-pro
description:
Using GPU instancing and Compute Shaders, GPU Instancer Pro helps users efficiently manage and render many objects by reducing draw calls and improving performance.

Please use the "Documentation" link to access the online documentation.
Please go to the "Samples" tab to import Sample scenes.

samples.description: Modifies demo scenes for the Universal render pipeline. [Demos] must be imported first.
Modifies demo scenes for the High Definition render pipeline. [Demos] must be imported first.
